channel.title: 508 client help plz
channel.description:
I got a new laptop for my b-day and i tryed to get my server to work on it. I got my server running, but when i want to get on, and start my client i get this message:
[code]'Java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
could someone help? thanks. (and dont tell me something stupid like, clients dont work on laptops cuz they do)

item.title: 508 client help plz
item.dc:creator: @Raams Raams
item.description:
@Raams wrote:

Maybe try editing the run.bat for the client? So make sure its going to the correct location and the right java for it. Maybe even try downloading a better Java, like a new JDK or JDE.

Hope that helps?

Read full topic

item.title: 508 client help plz
item.dc:creator: @hydraz hydraz
item.description:
@hydraz wrote:

Same problem you need to set the rgiht Java PATH AN CLASSPATH CODE i dont know the right one’s got same problem here…!

Read full topic
